name: A Fairy's Shelter
description:
Walk into a world full of fairies and traverse over 4 (wow.) unique environments as you search for the legendary artifacts capable of defeating the Chaos Fairy!

Featuring: 4 fairies, 1 voice actor, 2 endings, 1 or 2 dumb jokes, and 2 songs which are... covers? arrangements? (I don't know music words) of existing songs, so I think as long as I say that I won't get sued?  Hopefully?

Enjoy your adventure!  <3

*****************

Photosensitivity warning: The second half of the game includes flashing colors, and there will be a quick jump cut whenever you change areas, so that'll be a single quick color change.

Once again, I do not know for sure if the Mac build works.  It should, but please please please, if you want the Mac version and also want to give me money for it, wait until after you've made sure the game works.   Also, at one point in making this game, the area with grass caused my computer to lag quite a bit.  I think I got it fixed, but just a heads up, if your computer struggles there, I'm sorry, just try to make it through; the rest of the game should be fine, though!

This game was made over the course of two weeks for class.  Expect about 10 minutes of gameplay.
